title: Noam Chomsky - 2006-03-31 - Interview on Failed States - Part 1 & 2.  Democracy Now!  Improved sound
description:
Be sure to pick 720p for best sound and video quality.
On March 31, 2006, Noam Chomsky appeared on Democracy Now! to discuss matters related to his then recent book _Failed States_. 



I combined parts one and two, which were broadcast a few days apart.  De-noised, EQed, and sound leveled, to have better audio quality than the original broadcasts.  For the picture, I did a slight adjustment to the contrast and color.
